name: Shapeshifting Sorcery
description:
Hi!
This game was made for the LD35 game jam.

Game Info:
You're a wizard with only one magic spell! Shapeshift enemies!

Cast your donut (hmmm donuts) shaped magic spell towards the evil enemies!
Cast, like you never casted before, until those evil bastards change into a good object shape and fly to heaven (really, this is not a bug)!

For those who like bugs, this is the game you need :D


Controls:
Aim & Shoot with mouse (to shoot further, aim higher)
Move player with Arrow keys

This is my first "mostly" finished game.

Have fun!
